abstract.t: This RFC documents the trackback functionality in xaraya.

t.artwork:
Generic: http://www.movabletype.org/docs/mttrackback.html contains excellent documentation on trackback specs
Xaraya specific actions needed:
Make xaraya send out trackback pings ==================================== -> trackback module sends out the trackback pings -> a ping is triggered by: * creation of item * changing of item * deleting item
Make xaraya receive trackback pings =================================== When items on other sites change or are created as a trackback to a xaraya item a trackback ping is received This ping needs to be handled by xaraya and stored in relation to the item remotely referenced.
-> receive and parse the trackback ping -> route the information (based on url) to the right module-item and store the info there -> use display hook to display Trackbacks link and show the trackbacks
Make xaraya retrieve trackback urls =================================== When creating a new item, the trackback module should offer the possibility to retrieve trackback info from an url. This can be both manually or automatically
example in javascript: window.open('http://your.xaraya.com/ws.php?type=trackback&url=currenturl');
Xaraya trackback module can then inspect /currenturl/ and extract the entries on which trackback should refer to.
